name: Arisanna, Herbalist Prodigy
effect: b'On Enter: Gather twice. (To gather, summon a Blightroot, Manaroot, Silvershine, Fraysia, Razorvine, or Springleaf token, chosen at random.)'
flavor_text: b'"Adjuvants, catalysts, and materia abound! This world offers so much potential for research and experimentation. Now, what about this mixture?"'

name: Arisanna, Herbalist Prodigy
effect: b'On Enter: Gather twice. (To gather, summon a Blightroot, Manaroot, Silvershine, Fraysia, Razorvine, or Springleaf token, chosen at random.)'
flavor_text: b'"Adjuvants, catalysts, and materia abound! This world offers so much potential for research and experimentation. Now, what about this mixture?"'

name: Arisanna, Master Alchemist
effect: b'Arisanna Lineage (Arisanna, Master Alchemist must be leveled from a previous level "Arisanna" champion.)\nOn Enter: Gather twice.\nInherited Effect: At the beginning of your end phase, you may sacrifice two Herbs with the same name. If you do, draw a card.'

name: Arisanna, Master Alchemist
effect: b'Arisanna Lineage (Arisanna, Master Alchemist must be leveled from a previous level "Arisanna" champion.)\nOn Enter: Gather twice.\nInherited Effect: At the beginning of your end phase, you may sacrifice two Herbs with the same name. If you do, draw a card.'

name: Arisanna, Astral Zenith
effect: b"Arisanna Lineage\nOnce per turn, you may pay 0rather than pay a card's starcalling costs.
flavor_text: b'The chosen luminary of the celestial heavens. Her advent foretells both devastation and salvation.'

name: Arisanna, Lucent Arbiter
effect: b'Arisanna Lineage \n3, REST: Reveal the top card of your deck. Negate target card activation if its reserve cost is equal to the reserve cost of the revealed card.'
flavor_text: b'"By the moon\'s call, you will be judged."'

name: Arisanna, Lucent Arbiter
effect: b'Arisanna Lineage \n3, REST: Reveal the top card of your deck. Negate target card activation if its reserve cost is equal to the reserve cost of the revealed card.'
flavor_text: b'"By the moon\'s call, you will be judged."'

name: Diana, Keen Huntress
effect: b"Lineage Release \xe2\x80\x94 Materialize a Gun card from your material deck. (Activate this ability by banishing this card from your champion's inner lineage.)
flavor_text: b'A talented archer in a past life, her mastery of firearms came naturally while on Azoth. '

name: Diana, Keen Huntress
effect: b"Lineage Release \xe2\x80\x94 Materialize a Gun card from your material deck. (Activate this ability by banishing this card from your champion's inner lineage.)
flavor_text: b'A talented archer in a past life, her mastery of firearms came naturally while on Azoth. '

name: Diana, Deadly Duelist
effect: b'Diana Lineage (Diana, Deadly Duelist must be leveled from a previous level "Diana" champion.)\nOn Enter: Materialize a Bullet card from your material deck. (You still pay its costs.)\nInherited Effect: Ranged 2'

name: Diana, Deadly Duelist
effect: b'Diana Lineage (Diana, Deadly Duelist must be leveled from a previous level "Diana" champion.)\nOn Enter: Materialize a Bullet card from your material deck. (You still pay its costs.)\nInherited Effect: Ranged 2'

name: Diana, Cursebreaker
effect: b'Diana Lineage\nBanish all Curse cards from Diana\'s lineage: Materialize two Bullet cards from your material deck. Until end of turn, Diana gains "On Attack: Wake up Diana." Activate this ability only if there are four or more Curse cards in Diana\'s lineage. '

name: Diana, Cursebreaker
effect: b'Diana Lineage\nBanish all Curse cards from Diana\'s lineage: Materialize two Bullet cards from your material deck. Until end of turn, Diana gains "On Attack: Wake up Diana." Activate this ability only if there are four or more Curse cards in Diana\'s lineage. '

name: Diana, Duskstalker
effect: b"Diana Lineage\nOn Enter: Diana becomes distant. \nOn Champion Hit: Generate a Creeping Torment card and put it on the bottom of the hit champion's lineage. (To generate, add that card from outside of the game.)

name: Tonoris, Lone Mercenary
effect: b"On Enter: Tonoris gains taunt until the beginning of your next turn. (While awake, this unit must be targeted before other units you control during your opponents' attack declarations if able.)
flavor_text: b'Exiled and purged, he searches for his own truth.'

name: Tonoris, Lone Mercenary
effect: b"On Enter: Tonoris gains taunt until the beginning of your next turn. (While awake, this unit must be targeted before other units you control during your opponents' attack declarations if able.)
flavor_text: b'Exiled and purged, he searches for his own truth.'

name: Tonoris, Might of Humanity
effect: b'Tonoris Lineage (Tonoris, Might of Humanity must be leveled from a previous level "Tonoris" champion.)\nOn Enter: Tonoris\' next attack this turn gets +3 power.'
flavor_text: b"With replenished strength, Tonoris serves as a beacon of hope for humanity's salvation.

name: Tonoris, Might of Humanity
effect: b'Tonoris Lineage (Tonoris, Might of Humanity must be leveled from a previous level "Tonoris" champion.)\nOn Enter: Tonoris\' next attack this turn gets +3 power.'
flavor_text: b"With replenished strength, Tonoris serves as a beacon of hope for humanity's salvation.

name: Tonoris, Creation's Will
effect: b'Tonoris Lineage\nIf you would summon one or more tokens, you may summon that many Aurousteel Greatsword tokens instead.\nToken weapons you control have "Sacrifice this object: Target weapon gets +X power until end of turn where X is this object\'s power."'

name: Tonoris, Creation's Will
effect: b'Tonoris Lineage\nIf you would summon one or more tokens, you may summon that many Aurousteel Greatsword tokens instead.\nToken weapons you control have "Sacrifice this object: Target weapon gets +X power until end of turn where X is this object\'s power."'

name: Tonoris, Genesis Aegis
effect:
b'Tonoris Lineage
At the beginning of your recollection phase, choose one that hasn\xe2\x80\x99t been chosen\xe2\x80\x94 
\xe2\x80\xa2 Summon an Obelisk of Armaments token.
\xe2\x80\xa2 Summon an Obelisk of Fabrication token.
\xe2\x80\xa2 Summon an Obelisk of Protection token.'

name: Polkhawk, Bombastic Shot
effect: b'Ranged 2 (As long as this unit is distant, its attacks get +2 power.)\nRanger Reaction cards you activate cost 1 less to activate.'
flavor_text: b'"Liven up! We\'ll all dance with the flames."'

name: Nico, Whiplash Allure
effect: b'Whenever a card with floating memory is banished from your graveyard, put a lash counter on Nico.\nOn Champion Hit: You may have that opponent put the top X cards of their deck into their graveyard, where X is the amount of lash counters on Nico.'

name: Vanitas, Obliviate Schemer
effect: b'Vanitas can only level up into another "Vanitas" champion.\nOn Enter: If there\'s another wind element card in Vanitas\' lineage, glimpse 4.'
flavor_text: b'"With just a nudge, this seed will be ripe for harvest."'

name: Vanitas, Convergent Ruin
effect: b"Vanitas Lineage\nWhenever you activate a Spell card, Vanitas' next attack without a weapon this turn gets +1 power.\nOn Champion Hit: If 7 or more damage was dealt, cards that opponent materializes cost 1 more to materialize until the beginning of your next turn.

name: Alchemist's Kit
effect: b"Whenever you gather, put a refinement counter on Alchemist's Kit.\nBanish Alchemist's Kit: For every four refinement counters that was on Alchemist's Kit, draw a card.

name: Alliance Gearshield
effect: b"Ally Link (This object enters the field linked to target ally. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.)\nLinked ally gets +1 life. Class Bonus: That ally also gets +2 power as long as they're retaliating. (Apply the additional effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

name: Fatal Timepiece
effect: b"At the beginning of each player's recollection phase, if they did not materialize a card this turn, deal 2 unpreventable damage to their champion.
flavor_text: b'This broken malignant watch may still hurt twice.'

name: Navigation Compass
effect: b"[Class Bonus] This card costs 1 less to materialize. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)\nREST, Discard a domain card: Draw a card into your memory.

name: Orb of Hubris
effect: b'Banish Orb of Hubris: Draw up to three cards, then shuffle that amount of cards from your hand into your deck.'
flavor_text: b'Granted to many imperial alchemists upon induction, this relic symbolizes the relentless pursuit of the truth for the ascension of mankind.'

name: Resplendent Kite Shield
effect: b'On Enter: Put a refinement counter on Resplendent Kite Shield. Class Bonus: Put two refinement counters on it instead.\nREST, Remove a refinement counter from Resplendent Kite Shield: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to your champion this turn. '

name: Rusted Warshield
effect: b'Banish Rusted Warshield: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to your champion this turn. Draw a card into your memory.'
flavor_text: b'A relic of a previous age, this iron shield still has enough structural integrity to block a fatal strike.'

name: Seeker's Rifle
effect: b'[Class Bonus] True Sight (Attacks using this weapon can target units with stealth.) \n[Class Bonus] Spellshroud\nOn Kill: You may pay 2. If you do, materialize a Bullet card from your material deck.'

name: Synthetic Core
effect: b'Whenever a non-token Automaton ally you control dies, you may banish Synthetic Core. If you do, return that ally to your memory.'
flavor_text: b"Once, Claude's crowning achievement. Now, his constant reminder of failure and humiliation.

name: Temporal Spectrometer
effect: b'Divine Relic\nREST: Put a time counter on Temporal Spectrometer.\nWhile paying for a memory cost, you may sacrifice Temporal Spectrometer to pay for X of that cost, where X is the amount of time counters on Temporal Spectrometer.'

name: Wayfinder's Map
effect: b"Domain cards you activate cost 1 less to activate.\nBanish Wayfinder's Map: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you control three or more domains.
flavor_text: b'Critical landmarks and strategic bastions dot the battlefield. Strategic control is the key to success.'

name: Bombard Flarecannon
effect: b"[Polkhawk Bonus] On Attack: If there is a fire element card in this attacker's intent, deal 2 damage to each unit the defending player controls. (Apply this effect only if your champion is Polkhawk.)

name: Forgelight Scepter
effect: b"[Class Bonus] This card costs 1 less to materialize.\nAt the beginning of each opponent's end phase, if that player has an odd amount of cards in their memory, deal 2 unpreventable damage to their champion.

name: Heatwave Generator
effect: b'[Class Bonus] This card costs 1 less to materialize.\nAt the beginning of your recollection phase, target ally you control gets +1 power until end of turn.'
flavor_text: b"The Forgelight's mastery of heat transfer theoretics became their greatest war asset.

name: Cascading Round
effect: b"Renewable (If this card would be banished from the field or an intent, put it into its owner's material deck instead.)\nREST: Load Cascading Round into target unloaded Gun weapon you control.\nOn Hit: Put the top card of your deck into your graveyard.

name: Crystalline Mirror
effect: b'Whenever a phantasia enters the field under your control, glimpse 1. \n[Class Bonus] Banish Crystalline Mirror: Destroy target item with memory cost 0 or reserve cost 3 or less. Activate this ability only if you control three or more phantasias.'

name: Magebane Lash
effect: b'[Class Bonus] On Enter: Put a lash counter on your champion.\nMagebane Lash gets +1 power for each lash counter on your champion.\n[Nico Bonus] Whenever your champion is dealt non-combat damage, recover 2.'

name: Brewing Kit
effect: b'REST, Sacrifice three Herbs: Look at the top six cards of your deck. You may reveal a Potion item card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.'
flavor_text: b'The wonder of alchemy is the potential for discovery.'

name: Turbulent Bullet
effect: b'Renewable\nREST: Load Turbulant Bullet into target unloaded Gun weapon you control.\n[Class Bonus] On Hit: Up to two target allies you control get +1 power until end of turn.'

name: The Elysian Astrolabe
effect: b"Hindered (This object enters the field rested.) \nMaterialize this card only if it's the last card in your material deck, and only if your starting material deck size was twelve.\nREST: Until end of turn, you may pay 0 rather than pay a card's starcalling costs. When you do, glimpse 5.

name: Gloamspire Lance
effect: b"[Class Bonus] On Hit: Deal X unpreventable damage to the hit unit, then recover X, where X is the amount of Curse cards in the attacker's lineage plus 1.

name: Academy Attendant
effect: b"[Class Bonus] [Memory 4+] Academy Attendant gets +1 power. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class and only if there are four or more cards in your memory.)
flavor_text: b"Capable of cataloging the Academy's vast research.

name: Academy Guide
effect: b'Champion cards you materialize cost 1 less to materialize.'
flavor_text: b'"Contained within each exquisite tome is knowledge of the past and limitless potential for our future."'

name: Allied Warpriestess
effect: b'[Class Bonus] Allied Warpriestess gets +1 power.\n[Memory 4+] On Attack: Recover 2. (To recover, remove that many damage counters from your champion. Apply this effect only if there are four or more cards in your memory.)'

name: Automaton Drone
flavor_text: b"Schedule routine maintenance examinations every two years. Do not expose to temperatures in excess of 500 degrees for prolonged periods.\n\xe2\x80\x94 Manufacturer's Recommendations

name: Barter Herbs
effect: b'Sacrifice up to two Herbs. For each Herb sacrificed this way, summon your choice of Blightroot, Manaroot, Silvershine, Fraysia, Razorvine, or Springleaf token. \n[Class Bonus] Floating Memory'
editions: Alchemical Revolution Starter Decks 1 b'Hanh Chu'

name: Blightroot
effect: b'Sacrifice Blightroot: Your champion gets +1 level until end of turn.'

name: Caretaker Drone
effect: b'Intercept (Whenever your champion is attacked while this ally is awake, you may redirect that attack to this ally.) \n[Class Bonus] On Death: Glimpse 4.'
flavor_text: b'An inexhaustible servant with programmed routines.'
editions: Alchemical Revolution Starter Decks 1 b'Hanh Chu'

name: Deploy Gunshield
effect: b"Target Gun weapon you control gains spellshroud until end of turn. (Objects with spellshroud can't be targeted by Spells.)\nFloating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)

name: Distilled Atrophy
effect: b'Brew \xe2\x80\x94 One Blightroot, One Herb\nAt the beginning of your recollection phase, put an age counter on Distilled Atrophy.\nSacrifice Distilled Atrophy: Target champion gets -X level until end of turn. Then if that champion is level 0 or lower, deal X damage to them. X is the amount of age counters on Distilled Atrophy.'

name: Dusklight Communion
effect: b'As an additional cost to activate this card, banish an astra or umbra element card from your material deck. \nOn Enter: If the banished card was astra element, destroy up to one target phantasia. If the banished card was umbra element, Dusklight Communion gains "Champions get -1 level." '

name: Empowering Prayer
effect: b"Your champion gets +2 level until end of turn. Then if your champion's level is equal to the amount of cards in your memory, draw a card.
flavor_text: b'The diligent pursuit of horticulture is often rewarded when the environmental conditions are just right.'

name: Empowering Tincture
effect: b'Brew \xe2\x80\x94 One Manaroot, One Herb\nOn Enter: If Empowering Tincture was brewed, draw a card into your memory.\nSacrifice Empowering Tincture: Your champion gets +2 level until end of turn.'

name: Escape the Wreckage
effect: b'Return target ally you control to your memory. If you do, draw a card into your memory.'
flavor_text: b'A sudden and dangerous rescue in enemy lands.'

name: Exalted Dorumegian Throne
effect: b'Allies you control get +1 power and +1 life.\nUpkeep \xe2\x80\x94 At the beginning of your recollection phase, if you control four or fewer other domains, sacrifice Exalted Dorumegian Throne.'
flavor_text: b"Humanity's ascension gilded in iron, onyx, and gold.

name: Exorcise Curses
effect: b"Choose up to two Curse cards from a champion's lineage and discard them.\nFloating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)

name: Fraysia
effect: b'Sacrifice Fraysia: Recover 1.'

name: Freydis, Master Tactician
effect: b'[Class Bonus] At the beginning of your recollection phase, put a tactic counter on Freydis, then glimpse X where X is the amount of tactic counters on Freydis. \nRemove three tactic counters from Freydis: For the rest of the game, Ranger units you control are always distant. '

name: Harvest Herbs
effect: b'Gather. (To gather, summon a Blightroot, Manaroot, Silvershine, Fraysia, Razorvine, or Springleaf token, chosen at random.)\n[Class Bonus] Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.) '

name: Healing Aura
effect: b"[Class Bonus] This card costs 1 less to activate. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)\nAt the beginning of your recollection phase, recover 1. (To recover, remove that many damage counters from your champion.)

name: Into the Fray
effect: b'Up to one target ally you control gets +1 power until end of turn for each other ally you control.\n[Class Bonus] Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)'

name: Lena, Dorumegia's Herald
effect: b'[Class Bonus] True Sight\n4, REST: Look at the top four cards of your deck. You may reveal a Ranger ally card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. This ability costs 2 less to activate as long as Lena is distant.'

name: Lone Gunslinger
effect: b'Ranged 1 (As long as this unit is distant, its attacks get +1 power.)\n[Class Bonus] Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)'

name: Manaroot
effect: b'Sacrifice Manaroot: Your champion gets +1 level until end of turn.'

name: Navigate the Streets
effect: b'Glimpse 1+X, where X is the amount of domains you control. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)\nFloating Memory'

name: Oasis Trading Post
effect: b'3, REST: Glimpse 2.\n4, REST: Gather.\n5, REST: Summon an Automaton Drone token.'
flavor_text: b'A bustling trade port blessed by climate and sulfur.'

name: Organize the Alliance
effect: b'Target ally becomes fostered.\n[Class Bonus] Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)'
flavor_text: b'A united front to face down the Automaton horde.'

name: Palatial Concourse
effect: b'At the beginning of your recollection phase, glimpse 1. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)'

name: Plea for Peace
effect: b"Until the beginning of your next turn, players can't declare attacks unless they pay 1 for each attack declaration.
flavor_text: b'Once upon a time, Rose thought that they could resolve their differences with humans peacefully.'

name: Potion of Healing
effect: b"Brew \xe2\x80\x94 Two Herbs (You may sacrifice the listed objects rather than pay this card's reserve cost.) \nSacrifice Potion of Healing: Recover 5. (To recover, remove that many damage counters from your champion.)

name: Raze the Land
effect: b'Destroy target domain.\nFloating Memory'
flavor_text: b'Fires raged unchecked and smoke blotted out the sky. Nothing but rumble remained in the aftermath.'

name: Razorvine
effect: b'Sacrifice Razorvine: Put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck. If you do, draw a card.'

name: Reconstructive Surgery
effect: b'Choose one \xe2\x80\x94\n\xe2\x80\xa2 Put a buff counter on target Automaton ally.\n\xe2\x80\xa2 [Level 2+] Return an Automaton ally card from your graveyard to your memory. (Choose this option only if your champion is level 2 or higher.)'

name: Reposition
effect: b"Target unit becomes distant. (Units stay distant until the end of their controller's turn.)\n[Class Bonus] Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)

name: Sanctum of Esoteric Truth
effect: b'Whenever your champion levels up, you may put two cards from your hand and/or memory on the bottom of your deck. If you do, draw two cards.'
flavor_text: b'The sanctum sanctorum of an imperial alchemist. Incredible and horrific secrets can be found within.'

name: Scavenge the Distillery
effect: b'[Class Bonus] This card costs 1 less to activate.\nReturn up to one target Potion item card from your graveyard to your hand.'
flavor_text: b'Abandoned workshops often contain useful draughts.'

name: Scry the Skies
effect: b'Glimpse LV. Draw a card into your memory. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)'
flavor_text: b'The skies hold secrets only privy to the few versed in its signs.'

name: Seasoned Shieldmaster
effect: b"Whenever an ally you control becomes fostered, draw a card into your memory.\n[Class Bonus] Fostered allies you control get +1 power and +1 life. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

name: Serum of Wisdom
effect: b"Brew \xe2\x80\x94 Three Herbs (You may sacrifice the listed objects rather than pay this card's reserve cost.) \nSacrifice Serum of Wisdom: Glimpse 3. Draw a card into your memory.

name: Sidestep
effect: b"[Level 2+] This card costs 1 less to activate. (Apply this effect only if your champion is level 2 or higher.)\nTarget ally gains stealth until end of turn. (This unit can't be targeted by attacks unless permitted by true sight.)

name: Silvershine
effect: b'Sacrifice Silvershine: Recover 1.'

name: Springleaf
effect: b'Sacrifice Springleaf: Put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck. If you do, draw a card.'

name: Strategic Warfare
effect: b'Allies you control get +1 power until end of turn.\n[Level 2+] Target unit gains true sight until end of turn. (Units with true sight can attack units with stealth.)'
flavor_text: b'Reconnaissance and battlefield tactics can overcome even overwhelming numbers.'

name: Study the Fables
effect: b'Target player reveals six cards from their material deck. Draw a card into your memory.'
flavor_text: b"Perhaps the answer lies within Azoth's many myths.

name: Subjugating Lash
effect: b'As long as your champion has twelve or more damage counters on them, Subjugating Lash gets +2 power.'

name: Supply Drone
effect: b"[Class Bonus] At the beginning of your recollection phase, materialize a Bullet card with memory cost 0 from your material deck. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor_text: b'Armor-plated and heat-resistant to prevent the sympathetic detonation of critical munitions.'

name: Swooping Talons
effect: b'Choose one \xe2\x80\x94\n\xe2\x80\xa2 Deal 2 damage to target ally.\n\xe2\x80\xa2 [Level 2+] Destroy target item with memory cost 0 or reserve cost 4 or less. (Choose this option only if your champion is level 2 or higher.)'

name: Take Aim
effect: b"Target unit's next attack this turn gets +2 power. Class Bonus: That unit also gains ranged 2 until end of turn. (As long as that unit is distant, that unit's attacks get +2 power. Apply the additional effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

name: Take Cover
effect: b"[Class Bonus] This card costs 1 less to activate.\nTarget unit you control gains stealth until end of turn. That unit also becomes distant. (This unit can't be targeted by attacks unless permitted by true sight. Units stay distant until the end of their controller's turn.)

name: The Eternal Kingdom
effect: b"[Class Bonus] Domains you control have reservable. (While paying for a reserve cost, you may rest an object with reservable to pay for 1 of that cost.)\nUpkeep \xe2\x80\x94 At the beginning of your recollection phase, you may pay 2. If you don't, sacrifice The Eternal Kingdom.

name: Trained Sharpshooter
effect: b"[Class Bonus] Ranged 2 (As long as this unit is distant, its attacks get +2 power. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor_text: b'Military-trained infantry able to adjust position and sight an enemy across the battlefield.'

name: Unearth Revelations
effect: b'Draw two cards, then put two cards from your hand on the bottom of your deck in any order.'
flavor_text: b"Ancient relics lie buried underneath Azoth. Now, it's a race to see who can control their power first.

name: Vanish from Sight
effect: b"Activate this card only during an opponent's recollection phase.\nYour champion gains stealth until end of turn.
flavor_text: b'Like a wraith, Tristan slipped through the battle wrapped in shadows unseen, daggers ready.'

name: Airship Cannoneer
effect: b"[Class Bonus] Ranged 4 (As long as this unit is distant, its attacks get +4 power. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)\nOn Attack: You may banish three fire element cards from your graveyard. If you do, Airship Cannoneer becomes distant.

name: Airship Engineer
effect: b"[Class Bonus] Ranged 2 (As long as this unit is distant, its attacks get +2 power. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)\nOn Enter: If you control a distant unit, draw a card into your memory.

name: Attune with Flames
effect: b"[Class Bonus] This card costs 2 less to activate.\nActivate this card only during an opponent's recollection phase.\nTarget Guardian weapon you control gets +5 power until the end of your next turn.

name: Automaton Bomber
effect: b'Ranged 4 (As long as this unit is distant, its attacks get +4 power.)\n[Class Bonus] Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.) '

name: Blazing Charge
effect: b'[Class Bonus] Blazing Charge gets +2 power.\nOn Attack: Until the beginning of your next turn, if damage would be dealt to your champion, they take that much damage plus 1 instead.'

name: Bottled Forgelight
effect: b'Brew \xe2\x80\x94 One Razorvine, One Herb\nOn Enter: If Bottled Forgelight was brewed, deal 2 damage to target unit.\nSacrifice Bottled Forgelight: Deal 2 damage to target unit.'

name: Crimson Tear

name: Demon's Aim
effect: b'Put Demon\'s Aim on the bottom of your champion\'s lineage. Then your champion\'s attacks this turn gain true sight, "This attack can\'t be redirected by intercept", and "Choose the targets for this attack as though units didn\'t have taunt."\r\nInherited Effect: This object gets -2 life.'

name: False Step
effect: b'If damage would be dealt to your champion this turn, prevent 2 of that damage. Your champion becomes distant. Then you may pay 2. If you do, allies you control also become distant.'
flavor_text: b'The gliding shadows obfuscate and disorientate.'

name: Gloamspire Wraith
effect: b'[Class Bonus] Ranged 2\nAs long as Gloamspire Wraith is distant, it has "On Hit: Recover X, where X is the amount of damage dealt by this hit." (To recover, remove that many damage counters from your champion.)'

name: Load Soul
effect: b"Materialize a Bullet card from your material deck, then you may put two durability counters on a Gun weapon you control. If you do, put Load Soul on the bottom of your champion's lineage.\nInherited Effect: This object gets -2 life.

name: Mindbreak Bullet
effect: b"REST: Load Mindbreak Bullet into target unloaded Gun weapon you control.\n[Class Bonus] On Champion Hit: Look at that opponent's memory and discard a card from it.

name: Relentless Hexchaser
effect: b'Ranged 2\nOn Enter: If you control a distant unit, Relentless Hexchaser becomes distant.\n[Element Bonus] 2: Return Relentless Hexchaser from your graveyard to the field rested.'

name: Shadecursed Hunter
effect: b"Ranged 5, Stealth\nOn Death: Put Shadecursed Hunter on the bottom of your champion's lineage.\nInherited Effect: This object gets -2 life.
flavor_text: b'A soul bargained for the thrill of the hunt.'

name: Umbra Sight
effect: b"Draw a card.\nYou may draw a card into your memory and put Umbra Sight on the bottom of your champion's lineage. When you do, deal 2 unpreventable damage to your champion for each Curse card in your champion's lineage.

name: Umbral Tithe
effect: b"This card costs 1 less to activate for each Curse card in each champion's lineage. \nEach player draws two cards into their memory. Then deal 4 damage to each champion controlled by players with six or more cards in their memory.

name: Violet Haze
effect: b"All units you control become distant, then put Violet Haze on the bottom of target champion's lineage.\nInherited Effect: This object gets -2 life.
flavor_text: b'Obscure their sight, then dampen their senses.'
